Components.Name: AboutUsContentHead
Components.Configuration:
{ "Content": "

About LateRooms.com...

", "ComponentTitle": null, "Emphasis": false, "Visible": true, "Critical": false, "StyleClass": null, "HTML_ID": null }

Components.Name: AboutUsLeft
Components.Configuration:
{ "Content": "

Hello.

Thanks for dropping by. We’re guessing you’re here to find that ideal hotel stay… and that’s just what we do best at LateRooms.com.

Hotels for your every need

LateRooms.com is the UK’s leading hotel booking specialist. We provide a whole world of hotel possibilities, with fantastic deals backed up by our reassuring Price Promise.

You’ll find more UK hotels here than anywhere else, not to mention a huge range across Europe and even worldwide.

So from cosy B&Bs to luxury Spas, Thai beach huts to English country houses, Spanish Paradores to Moroccan Riads – you’re sure to find just what you need.

Open to all

At LateRooms.com you can book 24/7 online or between 2am and 11pm GMT over the phone. It’s up to you.

And that’s whether you need a hotel tonight, or up to a year in advance.

We work completely independently from any hotel groups and any hotel property can join our site. So you never know what hidden gem you might stumble upon.

Start your search here

", "ComponentTitle": null, "Emphasis": false, "Visible": true, "Critical": false, "StyleClass": null, "HTML_ID": null }

Components.Name: AboutUsRight
Components.Configuration:
{ "Content": "

Sleep easy with LateRooms.com

  • More UK hotels than anybody else - and a huge range worldwide
  • Book now, pay when you stay
  • Over 1.4 million genuine guest reviews to help you choose
  • Contact Centre open between 2am and 11pm GMT
  • No booking or cancellation fees*

*If you cancel within the hotel's cancellation policy

A little bit of LateRooms.com history

LateRooms.com was born in Salford, Greater Manchester in 1999, starting life as an 'on the day for the day' booking site for unsold rooms. By 2007 we had joined the world's leading leisure travel group, TUI Travel PLC. We're still loving life here in Manchester today, now offering over 65,000 properties worldwide with more UK hotels than anybody else.

And these days you can still book on the day of your stay, naturally, but also up to a whole year in advance - to make things nice and flexible for you.

Oh, and we've picked up some lovely awards along the way...

Awards

\t\t\t \t\t\t

", "ComponentTitle": null, "Emphasis": true, "Visible": true, "Critical": false, "StyleClass": null, "HTML_ID": null }
